Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Interface UserInterface

All Superinterfaces:
EventListener, PropertyChangeListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
CLI, GUI
public interface UserInterface extends PropertyChangeListener
UserInterface is a common interface for both CLI and GUI that defines all methods that these have in common

  • Method Details

    • getNickname

      String getNickname()
      Returns the nickname of the client
      Returns:
      the nickname of the client

    • askNickname

      void askNickname()
      Ask a nickname to the client

    • displayGlobalLobby

      void displayGlobalLobby(int numGames, Map<Integer,Triplet<Integer,Boolean,String[]>> gamesInfo)
      Display all global lobby information that the client will use to choose if he wants to play an existing game or if he wants to create a new game.
      Parameters:
      numGames - the number of games on the server that are not already started
      gamesInfo - all the games not started information (number of players, rules, players nicknames)

    • displayStringMessage

      void displayStringMessage(String message)
      Display a message in the user interface that notifies some events to the user.
      Parameters:
      message - the message to be notified

    • askTowerChoice

      void askTowerChoice(TowerType[] freeTowers)
      Ask the client to choose a tower in the setup phase of a game
      Parameters:
      freeTowers - the towers that the client can choose

    • askWizardChoice

      void askWizardChoice(WizardType[] freeWizards)
      Ask the client to choose a wizard in the setup phase of a game
      Parameters:
      freeWizards - the wizards that the client can choose

    • displayLobbyInfo

      void displayLobbyInfo(int numPlayers, boolean rules, String[] waitingPlayers)
      Display all the info of the game lobby on which the client enter
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players of the game
      rules - the type of rules
      waitingPlayers - the players that are already connected to the game

    • askAction

      void askAction(List<String> actions, List<String> actionCommands, List<String> currentPossibleActions)
      Ask an action to the client during his turn.
      Parameters:
      actions - all the actions descriptions that the player can do
      actionCommands - all the actions command to call the actions that the player can do
      currentPossibleActions - all the actions commands of the actions that the client can do without doing anything before

    • addListener

      void addListener(PropertyChangeListener listener, String propertyName)
      Adds the specified PropertyChangeListener to the user interface that will listen to the specified property name
      Parameters:
      listener - the PropertyChangeListener to be added
      propertyName - the property name that the listener will listen to

    • onGameInitialization

      void onGameInitialization(ModelView modelView)
      Performs all operations that need to be done when the game start
      Parameters:
      modelView - the ModelView of the game

    • printTurnMenu

      void printTurnMenu(List<String> actions, List<String> actionCommands, List<String> currentPossibleActions)
      Notify the client about what he can do during the turn.
      Parameters:
      actions - all the actions descriptions that the player can do
      actionCommands - all the actions command to call the actions that the player can do
      currentPossibleActions - all the actions commands of the actions that the client can do without doing anything before

    • onError

      void onError(ErrorMessageType error, String info)
      Notifies the client that an error from the server has occurred
      Parameters:
      error - the error type
      info - the error description

    • onResumeGame

      void onResumeGame(int numPlayers, boolean rules, String[] participants)
      Notifies the client to choose between starting a new game or resuming the previous saved game
      Parameters:
      numPlayers - the number of players in the saved game
      rules - the rules of the saved games
      participants - array of participants' name

    • onPlayerJoined

      void onPlayerJoined(String playerName)
      Notifies the user that a player has joined the game lobby
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player

    • onGameStarted

      void onGameStarted()
      Notifies the user that the game will start soon

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()
      Shutdown the application after a connection error
